title: Ranked on Friday Nights/Weekends
body:
{{champion:267}} Hey GD,

I have a craving to play ranked games because I played a couple last night and got into silver 2 and I wanna keep going maybe get a little higher than gold v (which is where I stopped playing last season).

I always get kind of nervous playing Friday nights because usually there are more kids around playing the game and I've sometimes found that to be frustrating to deal with with their raging/childish behaviour, but to be 100% fair, most people I know who are younger than me and play league are much better at it than I am so it could be a -better- time to play.

Just unsure, anyone have any experience on whether the dynamic changes on Friday nights/weekends? I don't want to just go by my own limited experiences.

Thanks
